title: Nick Hates Andy's _____ - The Kinda Funny Podcast (Ep. 226)
description:

Go to http://meundies.com/kindafunny to get 15% off your first order plus 25% off your first membership item.


Fill in the blank.

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:00 - Nick is mean to Andy
00:17:30 - SDCC ‘22(LOL, but not really)
00:27:00 - Joey Wedding Mexico Trip
00:32:00 - House of Prime Rib
00:47:50 - What would you do as a contestant on “America's got talent”

00:56:30 - Instagram’s new algorithm

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
